title: Hey Duggee - Funny Face Badge
cardDescription: The Funny Face Badge is from Hey Duggee Season 1 Episode 10 and has a funny face with a olive green round frame.
description: The Funny Face Badge is from Hey Duggee Season 1 Episode 10 and has a funny face with a olive green round frame.

content.content: Badge is worked as a spiral so no joining rounds until the outer edge.

content: (3 sc, inc, 2 sc) x6, at last sc pull through with SC [42]
slst, (inc with hdc, 6 hdc) x6, last hdc is made into the first slst, slst [48]

content.content: Fasten off and hide the yarn ends.
Eyes are done in one part.

content: with white 5 sc into magic loop (no joining), turn [5]
ch 2, (inc hdc) x2, ch, slst to 3rd st, ch, (inc hdc) x2, ch 2, slst to same st [9]

content.content: Sew in place so that the gap left in magic loop points down.

content: with pink 6 sc into magic loop, slst [6]

content.content: Sew tightly to the gap below the eyes.
With dark green, sew pupils horizontaly close to each other and little bit offset vertically. Using same yarn embroider a squiggly mouth.
For help with the pattern, please see the General Instructions from the main page:
